thread.section_title: The Renwick Hotel New York City, Curio Collection by Hilton - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Birthday Trip
thread.title_full: Birthday Trip - Review of The Renwick Hotel New York City, Curio Collection by Hilton, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Stella R
title: Birthday Trip
text:
Well where to begin. This was our first(of many to come) stay at The Renwick. We were impressed from the moment we entered. Had a little hiccup on arrival since all systems were down and we had a very long day waiting on our room. We were however upgraded to a studio, so no complaints!
We were very comfortable and felt quite at home.
I would like to throw out several kudos to this amazing staff starting at the top with Rich, so kind, so helpful, so personable. The front desk staff, Nellie, Judy, and Jasmine--- you're great and thanks for dinner recommendation (Prime). Yum
Your two doormen we dealt with, Nick----loved Rossini---very helpful on checkin too, and James--- thanks for heads up on transportation to airport. You're both great
And of coarse I must mention the staff at Bedford &Co. We are such creatures of habit, we sat at same table every morning. All the staff was very accommodating, but I must give special mention to our very sweet, attentive favorite----Lisette!!
Also to Dawn, enjoyed our time chatting with you
Last but not least----Tommy the head bartender. Great guy. Perfect for that job.
All this being said
